Name: 哪吒三太子
About the game: The classic FC stand-alone game , carrying players' full memories! Fengshenbang subdues the three princes The game mainly plays Nezha, little dragon girl, Yang Jian and Jiang Taigong. In the early stage, Nezha is the main line. In the middle and late stage, Nezha joined the king of Wu and went through hardships. Finally, he went to the star picking building of Chaoge city to eradicate the three demons and defeat King Zhou. That is, the famous King Wu attacked Zhou. The whole game has eight chapters Chapter I To vent his private anger, the Dragon King moved to Chentang pass to save the people. Nezha broke into the four Dragon Palace alone Chapter II The Third Prince of cultivation fearlessly went to the underground to break into the ten halls for his lover, little dragon girl Chapter III Nezha takes Erlang, the real king, Yang Jian and the four villains Chapter IV Nezha in the kingdom of the daughter dispels demons, Jiameng pass, Yang jiantu's disease Chapter V Nezha Xiqi solves the plague Jichang Fuxi meets Ziya Chapter VI Jiangziya, Ji Wen, Grand Master of wansha village, died at Qinglong pass Chapter VII Nezha exterminated demons for the people, and King Wu set up his army to attack Zhou Chapter VIII After the death of the tyrant King Zhou, a human catastrophe ended. At this time, Jichang was dead, and his son Jifa was supported as the son of heaven. The people lived and worked in peace and contentment. Jiang Ziya ascended the God worship platform and sealed the positions of those who were listed on the God worship list. A total of 365 positive gods were sealed. All the gods who were sealed performed their respective duties and restored the order of the divine world. ◆ support keyboard operation: the direction key controls the character to walk, the space /enter key picks up items, and talks to NPC ◆ the ups and downs of the plot, follow the protagonist to kill the demons ◆ rich hidden items, let's find treasure in the map together (the novice map has a novice artifact, so we must find it) ◆ surprise eggs and hidden plots, as long as you can find them, you will no longer have to worry about money and experience.
